author: Daniel Greene
description:
Ready to dive into the world of fantasy books but not sure where to begin? This is my attempt at an ultimate reading guide! Whether you're brand new to the genre or a returning reader looking to get back in, this video covers everything from beginner-friendly recommendations to how to navigate subgenres like grimdark, high fantasy, and urban fantasy.

We break down:
✅ The best entry points to the genre
✅ Classic vs. modern fantasy
✅ Common tropes & how to avoid burnout
✅ Fantasy subgenres

title: The ULTIMATE Guide to Fantasy Books (Where to Start & How To Find What You Like)
